name: Tank Era 2
description:
Tank Era 2 is a Free , Arcade , Top/Down , 2D , Shooter , Tank Game .

Inspired by legendry “battle city” originally released on NES, Tank Era 2 combines a lot of modern features with awesome arcade ideas including :

Modern Controllers

Different kind of Structures

More and different kind of enemies

Air support

Different kind of Traps

Random Drop Boxes

Different kind of ammos

Enemy structures

Teleport

Reflective surfaces

Slowing grounds

TNT

Shield , mine , grenade , thunder strike , EMP , missile , …..

And many more …

With over 200 unique mission

........

And much more
